info.description:
Circuit REST API to interact with the Circuit system.

[Learn more about the Circuit Development Community](https://www.circuit.com/web/developers/home)
info.title: REST API Version 2

scopes.ALL: allows full access to all functionalities of the REST API
scopes.CALLS: allows to start or join real time collaboration session
scopes.READ_CONVERSATIONS: allows to read conversations of the authenticated user
scopes.READ_USER: allows to read user information for all users that belong to the tenant of the authenticated user
scopes.READ_USER_PROFILE: allows to read the user profile of the authenticated user
scopes.WRITE_CONVERSATIONS: allows to create and update conversations of the authenticated user or to post messages
scopes.WRITE_USER_PROFILE: allows to update the user profile of the authenticated user

get.description: Gets a list of conversations and communities the authenticated user participates in.

parameters.description: The modification time of the conversation in UTC format. During the query the conversations before (default) or after this timestamp are returned. In case no timestamp is specified the current server time in UTC is used, i.e. the last 25 modified conversations are returned
parameters.name: modTime

parameters.description: The direction of the search based on the modification time. Valid values are either BEFORE (default) or AFTER
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description: The maximum number of returned results (default 25). The maximum allowed value is 100.
parameters.name: results

200.description: The matching conversations

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.description: Gets a list of communities. This endpoint can be used to explore the communities the authenticated user could join.

parameters.description: Defines the type of sorting for the community conversations (default is alphabetical)
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Defines the ordering of the conversations (default is ascending)
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: If set to false only conversations are returned where the user is no member of, otherwise all community conversations are returned
parameters.name: includeOwn

parameters.description: The index of the conversation that is the first one that has to be returned. E.g. if a request starts with startIndex 40 and results 20 the conversations 40 to 60 are returned
parameters.name: startIndex

parameters.description: The maximum number of returned results (default 25). The maximum allowed value is 100.
parameters.name: results

200.description: The matching conversations

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
    a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.description: Creates a community. Communities are open conversations that anyone in a Circuit domain (tenant) can join without having to be added by another user.

parameters.description: list of participants that will be part of this conversation, specified by the Circuit user ID or the unique email address. At least one participant needs to be added
parameters.name: participants

parameters.description: An optional description for the community conversation
parameters.name: description

parameters.description: An optional topic of the conversation. If not set the Circuit client will render the names of the participants as topic of the conversation (the first 4 names will be used)
parameters.name: topic

200.description: The conversation was created successfully and can be accessed via the conversation ID

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the userIds passed as parameter are not provided in the correct format
  • or an valid email address
  • or one or more of the user do not exist
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

put.description: Updates the information of the given community.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation which should be updated
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: An optional description for the community conversation
parameters.name: description

parameters.description: An optional topic of the conversation. If not set the Circuit client will render the names of the participants as topic of the conversation (the first 4 names will be used)
parameters.name: topic

200.description: Gets the updated conversation object with the new topic / description

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the conversation is not of type COMMUNITY
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

put.summary: Updates the information of a community

post.description: Adds the authenticated user to the given community (i.e., allows the user to join this community). Contrary to the operation of adding a new participant, this operation can only be performed by a user who is not yet a member of the community.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation which the user will join
parameters.name: convId

200.description: Gets the conversation object to which the participants was added

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the userIds passed as parameter are not provided in the correct format
  • or an valid email address
  • or one or more of the user do not exist
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the conversation is not of type COMMUNITY
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.summary: Adds the authenticated user to a community

delete.description: Removes one or more participants from the given community. The last participant of a community cannot be removed. This operation can only be performed by a user who is already a member of the community.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation from which the participant have to be removed
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The IDs or the unique email addresses of the Circuit users that have to be removed
parameters.name: participants

200.description: Gets the conversation object from which the participants were removed.

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
    the userIds passed as parameter are not provided in the correct format
  • or an valid email address
  • or one or more of the user do not exist
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the conversation is not of type COMMUNITY
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.description: Adds one or more participants to the given community. This operation can only be performed by a user who is already a member of the community.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the participant has to be added.
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The IDs or the unique email addresses of the Circuit users that should to be added.
parameters.name: participants

200.description: Gets the conversation object to which the participants were added.

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the userIds passed as parameter are not provided in the correct format
  • or an valid email address
  • or one or more of the user do not exist
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the conversation is not of type COMMUNITY
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.description: Creates a 1-to-1 conversation between the authenticated user and the user with the provided userId. In case there is already an existing 1-to-1 conversation between these users, the endpoint returns the existing conversation.

parameters.description: The participant that will be part of this conversation together with the creator, specified by the Circuit user ID or the unique email address
parameters.name: participant

200.description: The conversation was created successfully and can be accessed via the conversation ID

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the data format of the passed user does not match either a UUID (user primary key)
  • or an valid email address
  • or the user does not exist
  • or the user is the same who initiates the request

409.description: A conversation already exists. The response contains this conversation.

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.description: Gets the conversationIds which are marked as favorites.

200.description: A list of marked conversations or an empty response.

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the user is no participant of the conversation
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.description: Creates a group conversation between three or more users. The authenticated user is directly added to this conversation.

parameters.description: A list of participants that will be part of this conversation, specified by the Circuit user ID or the unique email address. At least one participant needs to be added
parameters.name: participants

parameters.description: An optional topic of the conversation. If not set the Circuit client will render the names of the participants as topic of the conversation (the first 4 names will be used)
parameters.name: topic

200.description: The conversation was created successfully and can be accessed via the conversation ID

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the userIds passed as parameter are not provided in the correct format
  • or an valid email address
  • or one or more of the user do not exist
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

put.description: Updates the information of the given group conversation.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation which should be updated
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: An optional topic of the conversation. If not set the Circuit client will render the names of the participants as topic of the conversation (the first 4 names will be used)
parameters.name: topic

200.description: Gets the updated conversation object with the new topic

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the conversation is not of type GROUP
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

put.summary: Updates the information of a group conversation

delete.description: Removes one or more participants from the given group conversation. The last participant of a group conversation cannot be removed. This operation can only be performed on behalf of a user who is already a member of the conversation.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation from which the participant have to be removed
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The IDs or the unique email addresses of the Circuit users that have to be removed
parameters.name: participants

200.description: Gets the conversation object from which the participants were removed.

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the userIds passed as parameter are not provided in the correct format
  • or an valid email address
  • or one or more of the user do not exist
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the conversation is not of type GROUP
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

delete.summary: Removes participants from a group conversation

post.description: Adds one or more participants to the given group conversation. This operation can only be performed by a user who is already a member of the conversation.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the participant has to be added.
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The IDs or the unique email addresses of the Circuit users that should to be added.
parameters.name: participants

200.description: Gets the conversation object to which the participants were added.

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the userIds passed as parameter are not provided in the correct format
  • or an valid email address
  • or one or more of the user do not exist
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the conversation is not of type GROUP
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.summary: Adds participants to a group conversation

get.description: Gets a list of all the messages the authenticated user has flagged. This endpoint should be used carefully in case where the authenticated user has a lot of flagged messages.

200.description: Gets the list of flagged items

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.summary: Gets a list of the flagged messages

get.description: Performs a search for conversation content. A maximum of 100 conversations is returned. If you hit this limit you should refine the search term.

parameters.description: The search term
parameters.name: term

parameters.description: not available
parameters.name: includeItemIds

200.description: A list of conversations and items that match the term

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the user is no participant of the conversation
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.description: Gets a conversation based on the given ID.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation which should be updated
parameters.name: convId

200.description: Gets the conversation object

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.description: Gets the conference details of the given conversation. Conference details include the URL, which is used to join the conference through a web or mobile application, as well as the dial-in phone numbers and conference PIN, which are used to join the conference by phone.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation for which the join details should be returned
parameters.name: convId

200.description: The join details.

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.summary: Gets the conference details of a conversation

delete.description: Removes a conversation from favorites. Favorites can be displayed in a separate side tab inside of the Circuit client to have a better overview of important conversations.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation which will be unmarked as favorite
parameters.name: convId

200.description: The conversation was successfully unmarked

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the user is no participant of the conversation
  • a field constraint is violated
  • the conversation was not marked before

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.description: Adds a conversation to the favorites. Favorites can be displayed in a separate side tab inside of the Circuit client to have a better overview of important conversations.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation which will be marked as favorite
parameters.name: convId

200.description: The conversation was successfully marked

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the user is no participant of the conversation
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.summary: Adds a conversation to the favorites

get.description: Gets a list of conversation items.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the items belong
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The modification time of the item in UTC format. During the query the items before (default) or after this timestamps are returned. In case no timestamp is specified the current server time in UTC is used, i.e. the last 25 modified items are returned
parameters.name: modTime

parameters.description: The direction of the search based on the modification time. Valid values are either BEFORE (default) or AFTER
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description: The maximum number of returned results (default 25). The maximum allowed value is 100.
parameters.name: results

200.description: The matching conversation items

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.summary: Gets a list of conversation items

post.description: Adds a label to a conversation, you can search and organize your conversations based on these labels

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the label is added
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The actual label
parameters.name: label

200.description: The label was successfully added

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • a field constraint is violated
  • you reached the maximum of 250 labels

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.summary: Adds a label to a conversation

delete.description: Removes a label from a conversation, you can search and organize your conversations based on these labels

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation from which the label is removed
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: not available
parameters.name: labelId

200.description: The label was successfully removed

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • a field constraint is violated
  • the label was not assigned to the conversation

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

delete.summary: Removes a label from a conversation

post.description: Adds a message to the given conversation. This operation can be only performed on behalf of a user who is already a member of the conversation.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the new item has to be added
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The actual content of the item, is mandatory unless an attachment is added
parameters.name: content

parameters.description: A comma separated list of attachment IDs from the file API.
parameters.name: attachments

parameters.description: The subject (headline) of the new text item
parameters.name: subject

200.description: Gets the new text item object

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the user is no participant of the conversation
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.summary: Adds a message to a conversation

get.description: Gets a list of all the flagged messages in the given conversation.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the item belongs
parameters.name: convId

200.description: Gets the list of flagged items

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.summary: Gets a list of the flagged messages of a conversation

delete.description: Marks a message in the given conversation as deleted. Deleted messages are still part of the conversation, but their content is no more visible. This operation can only be performed on behalf of the message's creator.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the item belongs
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The ID of the item that will be deleted
parameters.name: itemId

200.description: Gets the deleted text item object

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the item does not exist
  • the user is no participant of the conversation
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

delete.summary: Deletes a message from a conversation

post.description: Adds a message to the existing item. The added message will be a child item of the message with the given itemId.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the new item has to be added
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The ID of the item to which the new one has to be added as child
parameters.name: itemId

parameters.description: The actual content of the item
parameters.name: content

parameters.description: not available
parameters.name: attachments

parameters.description: The subject (headline) of the new text item
parameters.name: subject

200.description: Gets the new text item object

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the parent item does not exist
  • the user is no participant of the conversation
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.summary: Adds a message to an item

put.description: Updates the content or subject of the existing message. Only the creator of the message is allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the item belongs
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The ID of the item to update
parameters.name: itemId

parameters.description: The actual content of the item
parameters.name: content

parameters.description: The subject (headline) of the new text item
parameters.name: subject

200.description: Gets the modified text item object

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the user is no participant of the conversation
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

delete.description: Removes the flag from a given message that is posted to the given conversation.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the item belongs
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The ID of the item that will be flagged
parameters.name: itemId

200.description: The flagged state of item was successfully removed

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the item does not exist
  • the user is no participant of the conversation
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

delete.summary: Removes the flag from a message

post.description: Adds a flag to the given message in the given conversation.

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the item belongs
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The ID of the item that will be flagged
parameters.name: itemId

parameters.description: The time when the item was created
parameters.name: itemCreationTime

parameters.description: The ID of the item's parent
parameters.name: parentId

200.description: The item was successful flagged

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the item does not exist
  • the user is no participant of the conversation
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.summary: Adds a flag to a message in a conversation

parameters.description: The ID of the item that will be unliked

200.description: The item was successful unliked

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the conversation does not exist
  • the item does not exist

  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.description: Adds a "like" to the given message in the given conversation

parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to which the item belongs
parameters.name: convId

parameters.description: The ID of the item that will be liked
parameters.name: itemId

200.description: The item was successful liked

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:

  • the item does not exist

  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

get.description: Gets a list of the client IDs (applications) that were created for this user.

200.description: Gets the client IDs that allow to request for OAuth access

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.summary: Gets a list of client IDs

get.description: Gets the access token for the given token ID.

parameters.description: The unique id of the token to get the data for.
parameters.name: tokenId

200.description: Gets the access token

404.description: In case the token was not found or the requester has no permission to access the token

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.description: Gets a user based on an email address or username. If both parameters are defined, the email address will be used.

parameters.description: Search for a user by name
parameters.name: name

200.description: The users which match the search criteria

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • a field constraint is violated

404.description: The search term did not much any results

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

200.description: List of labels

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

parameters.description: The label value to add
parameters.name: label

200.description: The label was successfully added

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

get.description: Gets the presence status of the users whose IDs or email addresses are given.

parameters.description: A list of unique user IDs or email addresses of the users you want to query the presence state for
parameters.name: userIds

200.description: The presence states

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the userIds passed as parameter are not provided in the correct format
  • or a valid email address
  • a field constraint is violated

404.description: One or more of the users do not exist

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

put.description: Updates the presence status of the authenticated user.

parameters.description: The user's presence.
parameters.name: state

parameters.description: Timestamp until the DND state of the user is active. This field is mandatory when the state is set to DND.
parameters.name: dndUntil

parameters.description: An optional status message that is displayed instead of the location
parameters.name: statusMessage

200.description: The presence states

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the presence state is DND and the data format of the passed dndUntil is missing
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.description: Gets the authenticated user's profile information.

200.description: Gets the authenticated user's profile information

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

get.summary: Gets the authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Updates the user profile of the authenticated user

parameters.description: The new firstname of the user
parameters.name: firstname

parameters.description: The new lastname of the user
parameters.name: lastname

parameters.description: The new job title of the user
parameters.name: jobTitle

parameters.description: The new locale of the user. One of EN_US, DE_DE, EN_GB, ES_ES, FR_FR, IT_IT, RU_RU, ZH_HANS_CN.
parameters.name: locale

200.description: The modified user object.

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the user does not exist
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:

  • or a valid email address

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.description: Registers the webHook with the given filter and callback URL.

parameters.description: WebHook callback URL. Currently only HTTP is supported
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: A filter for WebHooks that checks for a list of configured events. This filter will use a regular expression to determine if it is interested in the events or not. The event itself is converted into a string of format AREA.EVENT. Examples: CONVERSATION.CREATE / USER.UPDATE
parameters.name: filter

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • an invalid URL
  • an invalid event filter
  • an unsupported event filter
  • a field constraint is violated

403.description: The maximum number of allowed webHook is reached

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

post.description: Registers a webHook that has a presence filter with the given URL and userIds. There is a maximum number of userIds allowed

parameters.description: WebHook callback URL. Currently only HTTP is supported
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: not available
parameters.name: userIds

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • an invalid URL
  • one or more invalid userIds
  • a field constraint is violated

403.description: The maximum number of allowed userIds is reached or the maximum number of allowed webHook is reached

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

put.description: Updates a registration of a webHook that has a presence filter. The update can be performed either on the URL and/or the userIds. The new userIds, if any, will override any existing userIds.

parameters.description: The unique ID of the webHook to update
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: WebHook callback URL. Currently only HTTP is supported
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: not available
parameters.name: userIds

200.description: The webHook registration was successfully updated

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • an invalid URL
  • one or more invalid userIds
  • no input parameter is provided
  • a field constraint is violated

403.description: The maximum number of allowed userIds is reached

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

delete.description: Unregisters the webHook with the given ID.

parameters.description: The unique ID of the webHook to remove
parameters.name: id

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the data format of the given id does not match a UUID
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

get.description: Gets the registered webHook with the given ID.

parameters.description: The unique ID of the webHook to fetch
parameters.name: id

200.description: The registered webHook with the given ID

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • the data format of the given id does not match a UUID
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

put.description: Updates a webHook registration with the given filter and callback URL.

parameters.description: The unique ID of the webHook to update
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: WebHook callback URL. Currently only HTTP is supported
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: A filter for WebHooks that checks for a list of configured events. This filter will use a regular expression to determine if it is interested in the events or not. The event itself is converted into a string of format AREA.EVENT. Examples: CONVERSATION.CREATE / USER.UPDATE
parameters.name: filter

200.description: The webHook registration was successfully updated

400.description:
The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax:
  • an invalid URL
  • an invalid event filter
  • an unsupported event filter
  • no input parameter is provided
  • a field constraint is violated

500.description: The server encountered an internal error and the operation could not be completed.

503.description: The server is currently unable to receive requests.

bridgeNumber.description: The number that has to be called to join the real time session of a conversation

country.description: The country where the bridge is hosted

name.description: The name / identifier of the bridge

type.description: Information of the billing for the call, i.e. if the caller has to pay or not for the call

avatar.description: The URL of the small avatar image of the conversation

avatarLarge.description: The URL of the large avatar image of the conversation

creationTime.description: UTC timestamp when the conversation was created

creatorId.description: The ID of the user who created the conversation

creatorTenantId.description: The ID of the Circuit domain (tenant) where the creator of the conversation belongs to

description.description: The description of the conversation. This field is available only for conversations with type COMMUNITY

isGuestAccessDisabled.description: Indicates whether guest access to the conversation is disabled or not

isModerated.description: Indicates whether the conversation is moderated or not. In a moderated conversation only participants who have been assigned the role of a moderator are allowed to add or remove participants into the conversation

modificationTime.description: UTC timestamp when the conversation was modified. A conversation is modified when any of the conversation object fields change but not when conversation items are added or edited

topic.description: The title of the conversation. Conversations of type DIRECT cannot have a title

type.description: The type of the conversation. It can be one of the following: DIRECT, GROUP, COMMUNITY or LARGE

bridgeNumbers.description: A list of bridge numbers which can be used to dial in to the real time session via phone

conversationCreatorId.description: The user ID of the conversation creator

isModerationAllowed.description: Indicates if the conversation is allowed to be moderated

isRecordingAllowed.description: Indicates if the conversation is allowed to be recorded

link.description: A link that can be used in a browser to join the session

pin.description: The PIN to join a real time session via phone

attachments.description: Array of files attached to the item

convId.description: The ID of the conversation the item belongs to

creationTime.description: UTC timestamp when the item was created

creatorId.description: The ID of the user who created the conversation item

includeInUnreadCount.description: Indicates whether the item is included in the unread message count

modificationTime.description: UTC timestamp when the conversation was modified

type.description: The type of the conversation item. It can be one of the following TEXT, SYSTEM or RTC

matchingConversations.description: A list of result items for conversations that match the search term.

convId.description: The ID of the conversation to which the matching items belong.

itemIds.description: The conversation items which contain the search result. The list maybe empty in case a hit was found for the conversation related data like topic or participants.

content.description: The content of the text item

contentType.description: The type of the text item. It can be one of the following: RICH (with HTML content) or PLAIN (only text)

likedUserIds.description: Array of IDs of the users who liked the item

parentId.description: The ID of the parent item of the text item. This field is optional and can be used for thread views

state.description: The state of the text item. It can be one of the following: CREATED (which denotes that it was not modified since its creation), EDITED (which denotes that the creator of this item modified the item) or DELETED (which denotes that the item itself exists but its content was removed)

subject.description: TThe subject of the text item. This field is optional and maybe filled when creating the text item

accessTokenURL.description: The URL to fetch the access token for an authorization code

applicationName.description: A free text identifier of the application that uses the client ID

authorizationURL.description: The URL to redirect a user for Circuit authentication

domains.description: The valid domains for the client ID

grantTypes.description: A list of grant types which are supported by this client ID

scopes.description: The available scopes for OAUTH 2.0 access

ttl.description: The TTL for a token generated with this client ID

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns a token

dndUntil.description: Timestamp until the DND state of the user is active

isOptedOut.description: Indicates whether the user has opted out of their presence

latitude.description: The latitude of the geo location of the user

locationText.description: The geo location of the user in clear text

longitude.description: The longitude of the geo location of the user

mobile.description: Identifies whether the presence state is based on the state information of a mobile device or not

state.description: The presence state of the user. It can be one of the following: AVAILABLE, OFFLINE, AWAY, BUSY, or DND (Do-Not-Disturb)

statusMessage.description: A free formed status message of the user

timeZoneOffset.description: The timezone offset of the user compared to UTC

type.description: The type of the RTC item
The type of the system item

company.description: The name of the user's company

emailAddress.description: The primary email address of the user

firstName.description: The first name of the user

jobTitle.description: The job title of the user

lastName.description: The last name of the user

locale.description: The locale of the user. (E.g. en-US, de-DE)

accessToken.description: The access token issued by the authorization server

clientId.description: The client ID used to generate the access token

expirationTime.description: The date when the token expires

scopes.description: Array of the scopes of the access token

creationTime.description: The time when this WebHook was created. This does not necessary mean the time when an manifest file was created.

filter.description: An optional list of filter parameters for this webhook.

id.description: The unique identifier for this webhook. Can be used later to unregister the webhook.

subscriptionIds.description: The optional list of userids for which this webhook is subscribed, i.e. presence events for the user are forwarded to the WebHook callback URL.

type.description: The type of a WebHook. This can either be MANUAL or EXTENSION. While manual WebHooks are only temporary and for development only use, permanent ones (EXTENSION) will bemanaged by the system.

url.description: The callback URL of this webhook.

userId.description: The user ID for which this webhook is subscribed, i.e. events for this user are forwarded to the WebHook callback URL.
